description:
Harima’s still bananas over Tenma, but now she’s setting him up with her sister! The culture festival has Tenma torn over her slacking talent, so Karasuma offers a shelled friend for inspiration.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scramble Reloaded! / Superstar Request! / Scandalous Restart!
Scramble ga Reloaded! / Superstar ni Request! / Scandalous na Restart!
